holidays.title: National Grilled Cheese Sandwich Day
holidays.description: National Grilled Cheese Sandwich Day on April 12 celebrated the incredible combination of Crispy bread and melted cheese.

holidays.title: Big Wind Day
holidays.description: Get blown away with some interesting facts about Big Wind Day.

holidays.title: Cosmonautics Day
holidays.description: This cosmonaut and national hero made history for humankind. Celebrate Cosmonautics Day with us.

holidays.title: D.E.A.R. Day
holidays.description: Get ready to drop everything and celebrate one of the most educational celebrations of the year.

holidays.title: Deskfast Day
holidays.description: Celebrating Deskfast Day can be fun, and delicious too  — let us show you how!

holidays.title: Halifax Day
holidays.description: Join us as we observe the embracing of American independence this Halifax Day!

holidays.title: Hamster Day
holidays.description: Hamsters are one of the most popular pets in the United States.

holidays.title: International Day for Human Space Flight
holidays.description: International Day for Human Space Flight celebrates humankind’s special relationship with space.

holidays.title: International Day for Street Children
holidays.description: International Day for Street Children gives a voice to the voiceless street children around the world.

holidays.title: International Day of Pink
holidays.description: Wear pink to support the campaign and stand in solidarity with the 2SLGBTQIA+ community.

holidays.title: National Dolores Day
holidays.description: Explore the Christian origin of the name Dolores and its usage in other countries.

holidays.title: National Fast and Prayer Day
holidays.description: Take full advantage of the day to fast, pray, and humbly ask God for protection.

holidays.title: National For Twelves Day
holidays.description: See some (not 12 — we can’t fit in that much!) fun ideas to celebrate 12!

holidays.title: National Gavin Day
holidays.description: Read on and learn about some famous people named Gavin and their life achievements.

holidays.title: National Licorice Day
holidays.description: Black licorice is a common ingredient in food items and it is healthy too.

holidays.title: National Mac Day
holidays.description: National Mac Day explores the rich ancestry and facts about this Gaelic name.

holidays.title: National Maya Day
holidays.description: Today is a great day to celebrate anyone called Maya and learn more about this name.

holidays.title: National Only Child Day
holidays.description: Hey, only children or those with only kids, here are some hassle-free ways to celebrate!

holidays.title: Silvia Name Day
holidays.description: Derived from a ‘forest deity’, the name is popular both in fiction and in real life.

holidays.title: Teak Awareness Day
holidays.description: Teak is one of the best timbers known to man and has an ever-rising demand.

holidays.title: Walk on Your Wild Side Day
holidays.description: Bring out your inner wild child on Walk on Your Wild Side Day.

holidays.title: Wear a Star Day
holidays.description: Today we get to share our grief and cherish the time we spend with loved ones.

holidays.title: Yuri's Night
holidays.description: Get ready to learn more about Yuri Gagarin — the first man to explore space.

holidays.title: Brendon Urie’s Birthday
holidays.description: Brendon Urie’s vocal range and multi-instrumental talent show that he has what it takes to be great.

holidays.title: True Thompson’s Birthday
holidays.description: True will be a woman who will give us something to talk about. Celebrate her today!
